response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,000,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant value proposition, allowing you to secure this remarkable asset at a competitive advantage. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how we can facilitate this transaction smoothly. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
